message.body: Hello. This is Lori.
I live in Pittsburgh.
I'm a computational linguist in the Language Technologies Institute at Carnegie Mellon University.
I'm a person, not a bot.
Lol. Well, that's good to hear. My name is Kyle and I live in Flagstaff, AZ. I'm an undergraduate microbiology student at NAU
Are you doing anything to celebrate July 4? I'm doing some work and spending some time with my family.
They're not having a good fireworks show tonight because it's been so dry. I'm probably just gonna spend the night playing Skyrim :/
My son plays Skyrim. He's playing Morrowind right now.
He's in high school and he plans to go into game programming in college.
I wish I could find a copy of Morrowind, but they just don't exist anymore :/
My son got it on Steam.
He says it's on Steam for $20 with every expansion pack.
I hope that's legal.
It is. I just have a bad computer to play games on, but Steam is a reliable game client. Plus they have tons of games to buy and play
My son is spoiled. We got him a gaming laptop a few years go. His high school has a computing major so now he is putting together a super desktop for gaming.
I wish I could afford to do that
He had to save up for quite a while. Part time jobs etc. I'm glad to see that he worked to reach a goal because he is not a top student.
Well, at least he's gonna do something he likes. That's why I'm studying microbiology, even if people here think I'm crazy for doing so
Microbiology is a great field. It is the future.
Why do people think you are crazy.
They say I am because the work involved to get the degree is insane. And this comes from chemistry and physics majors
What kind of research are you interested in?
Genetics
Sounds great.
Yeah. I hope that after this year I can find somewhere to do research for a masters degree
I have to work now. Meeting with my post doc.
Have fun for the rest of the day.
You too
